notes: It's the third floor boss. Use his body to get a random reward before you use the body of Evil Mastermind, otherwise you may not get any item. Is an [[Allusions|allusion]] to the demon Mephistopheles that appears in literature as a stock character version of the Devil.
sounds: I have a contract here which you should sign!
I sence so much potential in you. It's almost a shame I have to kill you.
Yes, slay me for the loot I might have. Give in to your greed.
Wealth, Power, it is all at your fingertips. All you have to do is a bit blackmailing and bullying.
Come on. being a bit evil won't hurt you.
name: Mephiles
behaviour: He will attack at a certain distance. Therefore, if you approach him, he will run away.
strategy: Corner him and kill it fast.
